programme.title: Roy Rogers and cinema cowboys
programme.short_synopsis: Remembering Roy Rogers and some other great cinema cowboys Wayne, Cooper, Hart and Canutt.
programme.medium_synopsis: On the death of Roy Rogers (1911 -1998), the singing cowboy, Cooke considers the great film cowboys, Bruce Wayne, William S. Hart, Gary Cooper and the stuntman Yakima Canutt.
